newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: SIMEX Brent market closed Monday for U.K. holiday.
newsitem.headline: SIMEX Brent market closed Monday for U.K. holiday.

text.p: The Brent market on the Singapore International Monetary Exchange (SIMEX) is closed on Monday to mark a U.K. Bank Holiday.
SIMEX Brent market follows the U.K. trading calendar because positions in Singapore can be mutually offset against positions on the larger International Petroleum Exchange (IPE) in London.
The SIMEX fuel oil contract trades as normal on Monday.
The NYMEX energy market in New York is also closed on Monday in respect of Memorial Day. Trading resumes Tuesday.
